author: Reuters Editorial
title: White House not planning new big trade initiative against China: official
text:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - President Donald Trumpâ€™s administration does not at this time have another new, big trade initiative planned against China and is focused on implementing the moves that have already been announced, a White House official said on Wednesday.
The official said the administration was aware of the market reaction to the trade row with Beijing, but said economic fundamentals and long-term trends were more compelling to policymakers at the White House.
Reporting by Jeff Mason, editing by G Crosse
